price: 73. Waarlijk, jullie Heer is vol gunsten voor de mensheid, maar de meesten van hen danken Hem niet.
arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَذُو فَضۡلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna rabbaka ladhū faḍlin ʿalā al-nāsi walākinna aktharahum lā yashkurūna
